chrome.notes: Before Chrome 62, the [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work on `::first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 40214861](https://crbug.com/40214861).

Before Chrome 62, the [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work on `::first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 40214861](https://crbug.com/40214861).

opera.notes: From Opera 15 to Opera 49 (exclusive), the [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work on `::first-line` or `:first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 40214861](https://crbug.com/40214861).

From Opera 15 to Opera 49 (exclusive), the [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work on `::first-line` or `:first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 40214861](https://crbug.com/40214861).

opera_android.notes: From Opera 15 to Opera 49 (exclusive), the [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work on `::first-line` or `:first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 40214861](https://crbug.com/40214861).

From Opera 15 to Opera 49 (exclusive), the [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work on `::first-line` or `:first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 40214861](https://crbug.com/40214861).

safari.notes: The [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work for `::first-line` or `:first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 3409](https://webkit.org/b/3409).

The [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work for `::first-line` or `:first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 3409](https://webkit.org/b/3409).

webview_android.notes: Before WebView 62, the [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work on `::first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 40214861](https://crbug.com/40214861).

Before WebView 62, the [`text-transform`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform) property does not work on `::first-line` pseudo-elements. See [bug 40214861](https://crbug.com/40214861).
